name: Speedy - Saves The World
description:
Due to the widespread of the deadly virus, Speedy aims to destroy the virus using sanitizer and mask. The virus being fatal harms Speedy every time it is touched. This idea is taken from the real-life circumstances to inculcate the sense of what is to be needed to fight the virus in people's mind.

Collect Masks

Collect Sanitizers to keep the car moving 

Stay away from virus

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Made by students of VIT-Bhopal (CSE with Specialization in Gaming  Technology )

Ripunjaya Tak ( https://renisys.itch.io/ )

Pranav Kumar Vasudeva ( https://azey616.itch.io/ )

Zoya Qadri ( https://zoyy.itch.io/ )
